creator: coar@apache.org
text:
With the variety of layouts supported, the 'make install'
process should create something in ${sbindir} that will
DE-install all the files distributed around the filesystem.
(Except the httpd.conf file. :-)
*** Bug 15965 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: slive@apache.org

text:
I don't know of any other open source projects that provide this type of
functionality.  It is beyond what httpd should do.  This is what ./configure
--prefix and Distro Package Management is for.  -> Wont Fix.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
